name: Relaxing Sarlacc Experience
description:
Unwind in a wholesome  drag and drop 2d game & experience perpetuity on Tatooine as a Sarlacc. 

You must feed your pit and keep it alive. Keep pit alive. Nobody else made that pun. No one. Also this is definitely not a game you should play if you are from Trysil, Norway. 

Just remember you are nothing but a speck in this wast universe, so why not chill out to some sick lofi starwars beats and take it easy.

Music is by Closed on Sunday https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsUTIOWt25_9bXBV7A9aepQ
